title: Hello Roleet !
content: Well, it's good to be home at last! Now, it should go without saying that this website is -and will remain!- under construction for quite a long time, it's a spare time project. What I'd like is a website where everybody can come and recors tehir characters, to share with the community *and* for our Masters to recycle them as NPCs in theiir own campaigns. Begone with the twentieth soldier named 'Bob' by lack of inspiration : now every NPC could have his behaviour, his fight style, his description, and so on !
